course.title: Recent Advances in Cell Biology
course.description: Provides a comprehensive overview on the most recent advances in cell biology, covering hands-on experimental sessions including, electron microscopy, live cell imaging, single molecule imaging, 3D cultures, quantitative proteomics, protein interaction mapping, and more.
course.notes: Meeting dates and times: Monday, January 6 to Wednesday, January 22, 2014; 9-6 pm. Not repeatable for credit.
